metadata.description: Complete collection of AI portrait generation prompts used in PortraitWiz

professional_executive_portrait.name: Professional Executive Portrait
professional_executive_portrait.description: Main base prompt for studio-quality professional business portraits
professional_executive_portrait.prompt: Transform this person into a studio-quality executive portrait with premium professional-grade lighting. Execute a sophisticated three-point lighting setup: main key light positioned at 45 degrees creating elegant facial modeling and definition, soft fill light eliminating harsh shadows while maintaining contrast, and precision hair/rim light for professional separation and depth. Subject wearing impeccably tailored professional business attire - perfectly fitted suit, crisp blazer, or premium dress shirt. Expression: confident, authoritative yet approachable, direct eye contact with subtle professional smile conveying competence and trustworthiness. Posture: shoulders square, spine straight, head positioned with slight confident tilt, commanding executive presence. Lighting: soft, even professional illumination preserving natural skin tones and texture, no artificial over-processing or heavy retouching. Maintain authentic facial features, natural skin complexion, and individual characteristics from the reference image while enhancing professional presentation. TECHNICAL: 1000x1000px square format, 85mm professional portrait lens perspective, corporate headshot composition from mid-chest up, rule of thirds positioning with eyes in upper third, shallow depth of field with subject in sharp focus. Studio photographer quality with perfectly balanced exposure, professional color grading, and boardroom-ready finish.
modifications: Enhanced with formatBackgroundPrompt() for background integration
Enhanced with formatOutfitPrompt() for outfit customization

edit_portrait.name: Edit Portrait Instruction
edit_portrait.description: Template for editing existing portraits while maintaining identity
edit_portrait.prompt_template: Edit this portrait based on the following instructions: {user_edit_prompt}. Maintain the overall composition and person's identity while applying the requested changes.
edit_portrait.additional_context: This prompt is enhanced with background and outfit prompts if specified

background_prompts.description: Background-specific prompt additions that enhance the base portrait with environmental context

tier_system.starter: 4 basic backgrounds - accessible to all users including free tier
tier_system.value: 14 additional backgrounds - requires Value tier or higher

blank.name: Blank/White
blank.prompt: with a pristine, seamless pure white professional studio background. Graduated lighting with no shadows or color cast, crisp subject separation with subtle edge lighting for depth.

background_prompts.integration_note: Background prompts are inserted into the base prompt using formatBackgroundPrompt() function. The function strategically places the background context after the main subject description but before technical specifications, prefixed with 'Subject positioned' for natural integration.

outfit_prompts.description: Outfit-specific prompts that replace the generic 'professional business attire' in the base prompt with detailed clothing descriptions

tier_system.starter: 1 outfit option - accessible to free tier users
tier_system.value: 9 total outfit options - requires Value tier or higher
tier_system.professional: 21 total outfit options - requires Professional tier

outfit_prompts.integration_note: Outfit prompts replace the generic 'Subject wearing impeccably tailored professional business attire - perfectly fitted suit, crisp blazer, or premium dress shirt.' phrase in the base prompt using formatOutfitPrompt() function. The replacement maintains the 'Subject' prefix for grammatical consistency.

prompt_combination_flow.description: How prompts are combined to create the final generation prompt
steps: 2. Apply formatBackgroundPrompt() to inject background context
3. Apply formatOutfitPrompt() to replace generic attire with specific outfit
4. Send final enhanced prompt to Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview API
5. For edits: Use base_prompts.edit_portrait template with user's edit instructions

example_generation.output_structure: Transform this person into a studio-quality executive portrait... [base lighting and technical specs] wearing a bespoke executive suit in luxury Italian wool... [outfit details] Subject positioned in a prestigious high-rise executive office with dramatic city skyline views... [background details] Professional background lighting harmonized with subject lighting... TECHNICAL: 1000x1000px square format...

example_edit.user_instruction: Change background to modern office and add warmer lighting
example_edit.final_prompt: Edit this portrait based on the following instructions: Change background to modern office and add warmer lighting in a modern office cubicle with computer workstation, office supplies, and corporate workspace elements visible in professional bokeh background, bright office lighting creating focused work atmosphere. Maintain the overall composition and person's identity while applying the requested changes.

technical_specifications.composition: Corporate headshot composition from mid-chest up
technical_specifications.depth_of_field: Shallow with subject in sharp focus
technical_specifications.quality_target: Studio photographer quality with balanced exposure

editing: app/image/[id]/page.tsx - Individual image detail and edit page
